narrative.narrative: LJ Air is a domestic Chinese airline that commenced service on February 10,2017. Its base irs Harbin in eastern most area of China. It's only destination so far from Harbin is to Hefei which is a 1,713 kilometer flight. Its initial fleet consist of two Airbus A321's, LJ is short for Longjiang, which is partly named for the province Harbin is the capital of ,Heilongjiang.
